---
name: Security Vulnerability
description: Report a security vulnerability
title: "[Security]: "
labels: ["security", "urgent"]
assignees: []
---

## Vulnerability Description

Provide a clear and concise description of the security vulnerability. Please be specific but avoid including exploit code.

## Impact Assessment

What is the potential impact of this vulnerability?

- [ ] Information disclosure
- [ ] Authentication bypass
- [ ] Privilege escalation
- [ ] Remote code execution
- [ ] Denial of service
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Steps to Reproduce

Provide detailed steps to reproduce the vulnerability. **Do not include exploit code in public issues.**

## Proof of Concept

If you have a proof of concept, describe it in detail without including actual exploit code. You may provide this privately to maintainers.

## Affected Versions

Which versions of the package are affected?

## Mitigation

If you know of any workarounds or mitigations, please describe them here.

## Additional Information

Any additional information that might help with the security assessment.

## Contact Information

If you'd prefer to discuss this privately, please provide contact information or request that maintainers reach out to you privately.

---

**Security Policy**: This package follows responsible disclosure practices. Security vulnerabilities should be reported privately first. Public disclosure may put users at risk.
